src:
Liverpool Bakal Terpeleset, Manchester City Diprediksi Bisa Pertahankan Gelar Premier League
05 Nov 2019, 08:26 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Langkah berat Manchester City di musim ini untuk mempertahankan gelar Premier League diprediksi akan berbuah manis di akhir musim. Keyakinan ini dilontarkan oleh eks pemain The Citizens, Micah Richards.
Musim lalu Manchester City tampil superior dengan menyapu bersih kemenangan dalam 14 laga terakhir sekaligus mengungguli kejaran sengit Liverpool.
Namun untuk musim ini, performa Manchester City sedikit mengalami penurunan. Dari 11 laga sejauh ini, tim asuhan Pep Guardiola sudah menelan dua kali kekalahan.
text:
Liverpool will slip, Manchester City is predicted to be able to defend the Premier League title
05 Nov 2019, 08:26 by Bola.net
Soccer - Manchester City's tough move this season to defend the Premier League title is predicted to bear sweet fruit at the end of the season. This conviction was expressed by former Citizens player Micah Richards.
Last season Manchester City appeared superior by sweeping the victory in the last 14 matches at the same time outperforming Liverpool's fierce pursuit.
But for this season, Manchester City's performance has slightly declined. Of the 11 matches so far, Pep Guardiola's team have lost twice.
